chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: Support for the management of ServiceNow CMDB records using ServiceNowâ€™s RESTful web service is delivered with this new namespace and class.
Records in the ServiceNow CMDB_CI_SERVER table are managed.

The following methods are included:
Method
Action
create
Create record in specified ServiceNow table.
delete
Delete record in specified ServiceNow table.
get
Get record from specified ServiceNow table and list its attributes.
get_all
Get all records in ServiceNow and list attributes.
update
Get specified record, update required attributes and post updated record.
update_patch
Post required attributes to specified record.
Configuration item (CI) and record are used interchangeably and refer items in a ServiceNow database table.
